page.title: 05Small Industries.
page.content: At{Lumsdale}near Matlock Green old mills have been adapted to cater for firms making reproduction furniture, paper products, a garage repair depot and store, concrete pumps, a wood works and a large dye mill; another firm sells wooden sheds. In the{Via Gellia Mills}near Cromford small industrial units provide facilities for electric golf carts,car repairs, an engineering works, rural training centre grinding minerals for the steel industry and an office equipment supplies. Other small local firms make model kits, leather goods and pottery. There is an ambulance station and G.P.O. engineering centre at Matlock Green.
